title: Light ray when refracted through three substances

content.question: A light ray enters a layer of water at point X, passes through a layer of glass, and exits through a layer of air at point Y, as shown in the figure above. Where would the ray exit the layer of air if the glass was replaced with a material of higher index of refraction?

choices.label: At a point above point Y
At a point below point Y
The location cannot be determined without knowing how much higher the index of refraction of the new material is.

content.answer: At a point above point Y
